Catalano.Graph.Network

Class Hits

  • java.lang.Object
    • Catalano.Graph.Network.Hits

  • public class Hits
extends java.lang.Object
    Hyperlink-Induced Topic Search. Hits is a link analysis algorithm that rates Web pages.
